sentences.sContent: These findings shocked the endocrinology community and set off a new wave of research.
sentences.sContent_eng: These findings shocked the endocrinology community and set off a new wave of research.
sentences.sCn: 这些研究结果轰动内分泌学界，引起新一波研究热潮。

sentences.sContent: Terry Wilkin, professor of endocrinology and metabolism at the Peninsula Medical School in Plymouth, argues that we have.
sentences.sContent_eng: Terry Wilkin, professor of endocrinology and metabolism at the Peninsula Medical School in Plymouth, argues that we have.
sentences.sCn: 特里威尔金，内分泌和代谢教授在普利茅斯半岛医学院，认为我们有。

sentences.sContent: He is an associate professor of endocrinology at Odense University in Denmark and has studied these hormones and their functions.
sentences.sContent_eng: He is an associate professor of endocrinology at Odense University in Denmark and has studied these hormones and their functions.
sentences.sCn: 他是丹麦奥登塞大学的内分泌学科的副教授，从事上述激素和它们的功能的研究。

trans.tranOther: the branch of medical science concerned with the endocrine glands and their secretions
